title: LF people to rank 5's
body:
Looking for 2-3 more people that want to play rank 5's CASUALY. 
So playing for fun and not caring if we win or not try new stuff, new position, new champions anything 
Also looking for between platinum/diamond players preferably kinda don't want a bronze or silver to go vs a plat 1 / diamond theres reasons why they are so higher up :) 

Playing when ever we can, Would love to play a few tonight if we can

replies.body:
Hey man, i'd be keen
I haven't played too much this year due to work but would be keen to play as the season comes to an end
I've sent a friend request :)
